  "Number of positions that have been closed for the account."
  closedPositionCount: Int!

  depositCount: Int!
  "List of deposits associated with the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Deposit entity."
  deposits: [Deposit!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of withdrawals made by the account."
  withdrawCount: Int!
  "List of withdrawals associated with the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Withdraw entity."
  withdraws: [Withdraw!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of borrow actions performed by the account."
  borrowCount: Int!
  "List of borrow actions associated with the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Borrow entity."
  borrows: [Borrow!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of repay actions performed by the account."
  repayCount: Int!
  "List of repay actions associated with the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Repay entity."
  repays: [Repay!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of liquidate actions performed by the account as a liquidator."
  liquidateCount: Int!
  "List of liquidate actions where the account acted as a liquidator, derived from the 'liquidator' field in the Liquidate entity."
  liquidates: [Liquidate!]! @derivedFrom(field: "liquidator")
  "Total number of times the account has been liquidated."
  liquidationCount: Int!
  "List of liquidate actions where the account was the liquidatee, derived from the 'liquidatee' field in the Liquidate entity."
  liquidations: [Liquidate!]! @derivedFrom(field: "liquidatee")
  "Total number of transfers sent by the account."
  transferredCount: Int!
  "List of transfers sent by the account, derived from the 'sender' field in the Transfer entity."
  transfers: [Transfer!]! @derivedFrom(field: "sender")
  "Total number of transfers received by the account."
  receivedCount: Int!
  "List of transfers received by the account, derived from the 'receiver' field in the Transfer entity."
  receives: [Transfer!]! @derivedFrom(field: "receiver")
  "Total number of flashloans taken by the account."
  flashloanCount: Int!
  "List of flashloans associated with the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Flashloan entity."
  flashloans: [Flashloan!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total value of rewards claimed by the account, expressed in USD."
  rewardsClaimedUSD: BigDecimal
  "List of markets where the account has enabled collaterals."
  _enabledCollaterals: [Market!]
  "Indicates whether the account is in eMode."
  _eMode: Boolean
}"}
